title: Barbara Ann
address: Calle de Santa Teresa, 8, Las Salesas
knownFor: Stylish venue with live music, DJ, and international cuisine
description: Trendy two-floor venue open daily for brunch, lunch, dinner, and late nights. Features velvet Chesterfield seating, rock/pop icon photos, and neon decor. Signature cocktails by Bryan Norman. Transforms into dance spot after midnight. Second location at Calle Cedaceros, 3.
